name: Time Mechanic Demo
description:
Time Mechanic is a simple platformer. Time is broken find all the hour-glasses to fix it. 

INSTRUCTIONS:

INSTALL: extract zip and run TimeMechanic.exe

GAMEPLAY:  "w"/ "left arrow key" go left, "s"/"right arrow key" go right, "w"/space key"/"up arrow key" jump touch the hour glass at end of level to move on.

This is my first uploaded game

This game is in pre-alpha 1.0.0 this is a demo. the game is not near completion example in level 7 there is a missing texture and there is only 7 levels.
